JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Writing reusable, testable, and efficient codeDesign and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performing applicationsIntegration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logicImplementation of security and data protectionCandidate will be responsible for developing and supporting enhancements to Odoo
